name: IP
description: Journalism is the lens that sharpens shadows into stark truths. In the shifting landscape of global power, International Press serves as a sentinel of accountability, illuminating diplomatic complexities and ensuring governments answer to the people.

name: AIPPM
description: As a pivotal simulation of India's national political discourse, the AIPPM Committee provides a platform for representing and debating the diverse perspectives of political parties across the nation.
address: AGENDA: Deliberating on the current reservation policy of India and the need to reassess it in light of the current socio-economic realities.

name: TNSM
description: Introducing the Tamil Nadu Stakeholder's Meet (TNSM), a committee where visionary minds converge to discuss the most pressing issues impacting the state's growth and sustainability.
address: AGENDA: Reviewing public health concerns in Tamil Nadu with reference to increasing alcoholism and substance abuse

name: UNSC
description: The simulation of UNSC offers a unique chance to navigate the intricacies of global diplomacy. Delegates will address threats to peace, protect human rights, and seek resolutions to hostilities.

name: UNGA
description: As the core of the UN, the UNGA empowers the voice of every nation's voice to resonate within the halls of international influence.
address: AGENDA: Responsibility to Protext (2005 World Summit)

name: ECOSOC
description: Established in 1945, ECOSOC has been a pioneer in addressing the most pressing global challenges. Here, nations unite to propel economic growth, refine macroeconomic policies, and tackle the complexities of global finance.
address: AGENDA: Socio-economic deprivation and persecution of refugees

name: UNHRC
description: In the pursuit of justice and human dignity, the UN Human Rights Council (UNHRC) stands as a steadfast advocate, ensuring that every voice is heard and every right is upheld.
address: AGENDA: Implementing the Universal Periodic Review recommendations with emphasis on cooperation and capacity building
